title: 关于多世界无法破坏的问题·来大神啊·求救
author: yx522503421
txt_content:
我已经把多世界的权限独立出来了·可以一把builder组的build权限改成false就什么都不能干了·包括拾取东西·和命令方块使用··怎么办啊·求救啊
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    - -vanish.*
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.author: -Love-
replies.txt_content: build是建筑放置交互的一些权限，默认是true才能正常游戏

replies.author: yx522503421
replies.txt_content:
-Love- 发表于 2015-3-19 21:59
build是建筑放置交互的一些权限，默认是true才能正常游戏
那多世界里某一个世界怎么设置才能不让玩家破坏东西呢

replies.author: yx522503421
replies.txt_content:
yx522503421 发表于 2015-3-19 22:09
那多世界里某一个世界怎么设置才能不让玩家破坏东西呢
求大神啊··大神啊啊·····

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: /mv modify set build false 世界名称即可

replies.author: 602844218qq
replies.txt_content: 把建筑组开启。默认组关闭就可以了

replies.author: yx522503421
replies.txt_content:
602844218qq 发表于 2015-3-20 09:00
把建筑组开启。默认组关闭就可以了
没看懂啊··能详细点吗大神

replies.author: 602844218qq
replies.txt_content:
yx522503421 发表于 2015-3-21 10:43
没看懂啊··能详细点吗大神
把defaylt的defauit:开启
把Builder的defauit：关闭

replies.author: yx522503421
replies.txt_content:
602844218qq 发表于 2015-3-21 15:24
把defaylt的defauit:开启
把Builder的defauit：关闭
这样玩家能捡东西和打怪
